title: Unable to log in to League?
body:
https://gyazo.com/763052d51d74480e0560819f94a5c986

I get this message every time i attempt to log into League. 

We've tried:

* IP Config flush/DNS
* Log-in Admin
* Re-installing the Client (Twice)
* And checked our Security Program (Norton) to make sure it wasn't restricting it. 

Can we get any help with this, because it's frustrating.

replies.body:
There may be issues with your Internet Explorer security settings, which League heavily relies on. I strongly encourage you to work through our [login issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) as a next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

https://gyazo.com/0d164f4ab912f719fc63894e4830674c

Got this when i entered the site.

That's really strange! To see if this is caused by an issue with your local network, I'd like you to perform a power cycle for your home network:

>- Shut down all computers connected to your home network (modem/router/gateway).
- Power down/unplug your router, if you use one.
- Power down/unplug your modem.  Have both devices off for at least 60 seconds.
Note: If your modem has a battery backup you will need to take the battery out for 60 seconds or use the reset button on the modem.
- Turn on your modem and allow it to completely boot up.  Wait until the indicator lights on the device stop blinking and display a steady green connection.
- Turn on the router (if you have one) and allow to completely boot up as well.
- Start the computers and allow it to completely boot up and re-establish an internet connection. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Having the same issue in the Toronto area.
